notes.title: Initial Consultation
notes.content: Patient presented with complaints of frequent urination and increased thirst. Blood tests reveal elevated glucose levels. Diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes. Prescribed Metformin and advised on dietary changes.

notes.title: Follow-up
notes.content: Patient's condition has improved. Blood glucose levels are stabilizing. Continuing current treatment plan. Encouraged patient to maintain diet and exercise regimen.

notes.title: Follow-up - Summary
notes.content:
Key points summary:

• Condition improved
• Blood glucose stabilizing
• Continuing current treatment
• Encouraged diet and exercise maintenance

notes.title: Initial Consultation
notes.content: Patient reported fatigue and weight gain. Blood tests showed low thyroid hormone levels. Diagnosed with hypothyroidism. Prescribed Levothyroxine and ordered follow-up tests.

notes.title: Follow-up
notes.content: Patient feeling more energetic. Thyroid levels improving but still below normal range. Adjusted Levothyroxine dosage. Also noted low Vitamin D levels and prescribed supplements.
